example.eg: The administrators evaluated the company's assets.
example.egtrans: 管理人员鉴定了公司资产。

example.eg: The board evaluated the candidates for the job.
example.egtrans: 董事会评审了那个职位的几位候选人。

example.eg: The boss evaluated the project to see if it had been worthwhile.
example.egtrans: 老板衡量了一下那个项目，看是否有价值。

example.eg: We will reevaluate your knowledge of the subject in six months, to see if you are making enough progress.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 重新考虑, 再度评估
